COMMENT_TX: Debut game for Jim Smith
$Mike Ramsey called for interference at 2B
$Joe Cowley left with injured shoulder
Debut game for Willie McGee
$Alex Trevino let WP roll into dugout
$Garry Templeton was hit in the face by throw
ej,willd104,M,westj901,Obstruction call $Padres manager Williams ejected by 3B umpire West for arguing obstruction on Salazar
Debut game for John Stuper

$Hidden ball trick; Dawson threw ball back in after fly out, but Speier did not return it to pitcher, instead taking his position at short; As Oberkfell stepped into the box, Smith took his lead and Speier ran over to tag him
$Ken Oberkfell was injured in a collision with Dave LaPoint
12 minute rain delay
1:57 rain delay
ej,herzw101,M,davis901,Appeal play $Willie McGee missed HP and was tagged out in the dugout after Mike Ramsey was tagged out at 2B; Cardinals manager Whitey Herzog ejected by HP umprie Satch Davidson
ej,herzb101,M,tatat901,Balk non-call ej,lanih101,M,tatat901,Balk non-call $Cardinals manager Herzog and coach Lanier ejected by 1B umpire Tata for arguing pitcher balked on pickoff
Debut game for Tom Lawless
ej,tannc101,M,davib902,Call at 1B Pirates manager Chuck Tanner ejected by 1B umpire Bob Davidson
$Keith Hernandez called for interference with catcher
$John Candelaria left with stiff forearm
2:04 rain delay and then game was called
36 minute rain delay

ej,willd104,M,brocf901,Runner placement on fan interference $Padres manager Williams ejected by 3B umpire Brocklander for arguing that Kennedy should have awarded home on fan interference double; other umpires overruled and awarded Kennedy home, but Williams was already ejected
ej,clarj001,P,palld901,Balls and strikes Jack Clark ejected by HP umpire Dave Pallone
ej,reusj001,P,colon901,Balls and strikes $Dodgers Reuss, no longer in game, ejected by HP umpire Colosi for arguing balls and strikes
$Hubie Brooks rounded 1B too far
1:09 rain delay before start of game
